jd: Job Description -Title : M365 Business Systems AnalystLocation : Ann Arbor, MI(need Local)Duration: 6+ months Visa: USC and GC MOI: Video Need only 1 profile. With M365 you get everything that O365 has but it is a Cloud Powered Productivity Platform............note there is a difference between O365 and M365!Responsibilities:Write Technical Design documents and BRD’sWrite StoriesDeliver documentation and present to stakeholders -Develop strong understanding of Michigan Medicine applications and how they facilitate business.-Conduct critical design reviews with team, vendor, and other required IT entities.-Develop high level and/or detailed storyboards, mockups and prototypes to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas to the development team Requirements:-5+ years of experience working as a Business Systems Analyst, Systems Analyst, or Application Analyst.-Competent to work at the highest technical level of most phases of systems analysis while considering the business implications of the application of technology to the current and future business environment.-Experience delivering the M365 technology platform in an enterprise environment.-Strong analytical thinking.-Strong problem-solving capacity.-Solid technical design capability.-Strong knowledge of data visualization tools.-High level written and verbal communication skills.-Ability to work under pressure and tight schedules
